OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupDb
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Contains a set of lens models.

OfxParamTypeString.name: Query
OfxParamTypeString.OfxParamPropHint: Enter a lens model name to search for.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: ShowMesh
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxPropLongLabel: Show Distorsion according to specified parameters
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Show the distortion which is corrected by the specified parameters.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: DistCenter
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Adjust the center in case your lens is off-centered.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: RadialDistParam1
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This is the parameter a of ptlens model.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: RadialDistParam2
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This is the parameter b of ptlens model.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: RadialDistParam3
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This is the parameter c of ptlens model.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: GridCountLink
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxPropLabel: Lock Grid size in X and Y
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxPropShortLabel: Lock Grid size in X and Y
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxPropLongLabel: Lock Grid size in X and Y
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Keeps grid size in X and Y equal.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: KeepMeshStructure
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Trys to keep structure of grid while resizing.

OfxImageEffectContext.name: OfxImageEffectContextFilter
OfxImageEffectContext.OfxMessage: Your graphics card does not have sufficient memory to complete this operation at the quality level you've specified. You must choose a lower quality setting.
This plug-in relies heavily on GPU usage. You are currently using CPU processing. Although the plug-in will still function, expect slow performance and potential artifacts in the results.

Edits made to this event after you apply Slow Motion could lead to unexpected results. It's best to make your edits to this event before you apply the Slow Motion effect. Alternatively, apply Slow Motion at the media effect level where no editing restrictions apply.

A Playback Rate greater than 1.0 will have unexpected results if you change the event length. If you need to change the length of the event after applying a rate greater than 1.0, apply the Slow Motion plug-in at the media level where no restrictions apply.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: Choice Box Algorithm
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Switches between the different methods for creating intermediate frames.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: Choice Box Quality
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: Switches between the different qualities for creating intermediate frames.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: Slow Motion Ratio
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter change the speed ratio of the clip.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: Clear Button
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Clears the results of motion analysis.

OfxImageEffectContext.name: OfxImageEffectContextFilter
OfxImageEffectContext.OfxMessage:
You've added the Video Stabilization plug-in to an event. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX.

You've added the Video Stabilization plug-in to a track. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX.

You've added the Video Stabilization plug-in to the video output. This plug-in must be applied to a clip or subclip as a media effect.
To apply media effects, select an event on the timeline (or a clip in the Project Media window) and choose Tools > Video > Media FX.
To stabilize the video, click the Stabilize / Analyze Motion button. Do not attempt to preview the media or play your project while stabilization is in process.

Edits made to this event (trimming, splitting, etc.) could result in lost stabilization data or other unexpected results. It's best to do all of your edits to this event before applying stabilization.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupParameters
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information about the parameters before stabilization.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupSmoothing
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information about the stabilization/smoothing process.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: IsStaticCamera
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Switches the mode between smoothing motion ('Static Camera' is disabled) and fixing motion ('Static Camera' is enabled).

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: StaticReference
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter changes the reference frame around the video motion is stabilized.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: Presets
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: This choice box affects the motion tracking algorithm, the way trackable points are determined and which motion tracks are concerned for motion modeling.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: MotionCompensation
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: This choice box affects the motion modeling algorithm.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: SmoothingMagnitude
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: The Smoothing Magnitude (in seconds) is the parameter that helps to define how much "unsteadiness" should be kept in a scene, the higher that factor is, the more the movements are smoothed.

OfxParamTypePushButton.name: CLearMotion
OfxParamTypePushButton.OfxParamPropHint: Clears the results of motion analysis.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupBorders
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information about the borders.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: AvoidBlackBorders
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Click to automatically zoom in to avoid black borders.

OfxParamTypeDouble2D.name: AdditionalTranslation
OfxParamTypeDouble2D.OfxParamPropHint: Adds an offset to the position.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: AdditionalRotation
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adds an offset to the rotation. The Rotation (angle) parameter can be used to straighten the horizon.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: AdditionalScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Adds an offset to the zoom. You can zoom in to avoid black border or focus on the center of the image.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: Zoom_Filling
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: This choice box affects the filling of the background.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupMotionBlur
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information about the motion blur.

OfxParamTypeBoolean.name: MotionBlur
OfxParamTypeBoolean.OfxParamPropHint: Click to add Motion Blur to horizontal camera pans.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: MotionBlurThreshold
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: Motion Blur is only applied if the detected horizontal camera pans exceeds that threshold.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupExpertMode
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information to adjust the tracking algorithm.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: XScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter shrinks the width of the region of interest.

OfxParamTypeDouble.name: YScale
OfxParamTypeDouble.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter shrinks the height of the region of interest.

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: NumGridsX
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter changes the number of grids in X.

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: NumGridsY
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter changes the number of grids in Y.

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: PointsPerGridCell
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxPropLabel: Number of Points per Grid Cell
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxPropShortLabel: Number of Points per Grid Cell
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxPropLongLabel: Number of Points per Grid Cell
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter changes the number of points per cell.

OfxParamTypeChoice.name: ChoiceTrackerType
OfxParamTypeChoice.OfxParamPropHint: This choice box affects the type of the tracker.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupLockState
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information to adjust the smoothing parameters.

OfxParamTypeGroup.name: GroupVisualization
OfxParamTypeGroup.OfxParamPropHint: Shows additional information about the visualization.

OfxParamTypeInteger.name: ShowFeaturesMinLen
OfxParamTypeInteger.OfxParamPropHint: This parameter determines which tracking points are shown.

OfxImageEffectContext.name: OfxImageEffectContextTransition
OfxImageEffectContext.OfxMessage: Your clips differ too much for dependable results, so the Warp Flow transition may result in a simple crossfade.
